thread.section_title: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand | acerentalcars.co.nz
thread.title: PeterWeb
thread.title_full: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand reviewed by PeterWeb

author: PeterWeb
title: PeterWeb
text: I've used Ace many times in both countries. Especially in New Zealand I find their service very quick and efficient, at a reasonable price for the cars on offer. The main reason I have to go to their competitors from time to time is that they don't have very long office hours, even at major destinations like Wellington. The premium cost for alternate out-of-hours pick-up (where available) is sometimes viable, but often not.
